alert.note: Alert for Clay; Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 3:57PM EDT until April 27 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Putnam County in northeastern Florida... Southwestern Clay County in northeastern Florida... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 357 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Melrose, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Melrose, Melrose Landing, George`s Lake, Lake Geneva, Florahome, Putnam Hall and Carraway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
